title: Associate Executive Director - McBurney - Sports and Fitness
text: Posted/Updated: 10-01-2015 Brief Job Description: Specific areas of responsibility will include management of a program portfolio and operations. In addition, the Associate Executive Director will provide support with communications, community relations, board development plus fiscal management
